str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; a separatist, i.e. Exclusively religious; a Pharisean, i.e. Jewish sectary.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From skandalon; to entrap, i.e. Trip up (transitively) or entice to sin, apostasy or displeasure).

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
